channel.title: Postgres Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Postgres.app 2.9.3
item.description:
This update no longer includes PostgreSQL 13 since it is no longer supported.

Do not install this update if you are still using PostgreSQL 13.

If you are still using PostgreSQL 13, please migrate your database to a newer version before installing this upgrade.

  • PostgreSQL 14.21 with PostGIS 3.2.8
  • PostgreSQL 15.16 with PostGIS 3.3.8
  • PostgreSQL 16.12 with PostGIS 3.4.5
  • PostgreSQL 17.8 with PostGIS 3.5.5
  • PostgreSQL 18.2 with PostGIS 3.6.2

You can find more info on the Github Releases Page.
